summary:
This mod adds two new spells you can get by fighting a group of Liches in Ragnvald, north of Markarth.
Unspontaneous
Combustion which makes targets explodes on death, leaving only an ashpile left.
Exposing Wind which drains stamina and has a chance of blowing of armors and clothes.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#ff0000] THIS MOD WILL NOT WORK WITHOUT THE SKYRIM SCRIPT EXTENDER (SKSE)[/color][/b]
[b][color=#ff0000] Get it here -> skse.silverlock.org[/color][/b]

[color=#ffd700][b]FEATURES[/b][/color]
This mod adds two new spells you can get by fighting a group of Liches in Ragnvald, north of Markarth.
Unspontaneous
Combustion which makes targets explodes on death, leaving only an ashpile left.
Exposing Wind which drains stamina and has a chance of blowing of armors and clothes.

If you want the Liches in this mod as summons get my Summon Skeletal Horde mod:
http://steamcommunit...tails/?id=11363
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9583
http://tesalliance.o...skeletal-horde/

[color=#ffd700][b]INSTALLING[/b][/color][list=1]
[*]Install as any ordinary mod, dump all files inside skyrim/data & activate Unspontaneous-combustion.esp.
[*]Travel to Ragnvald, north of Markarth.
[*]Fight a bunch of Liches and their immortal boss.
[/list]

[color=#ffd700][b]KNOWN BUGS[/b][/color]
This mod can maybe disrobe a NPC of some clothing that was not meant for disrobing.

[color=#ffd700][b]HINT:[/b][/color]
Cast Exposing Wind on the Lich boss to disrobe him of his Robe of Immortality.


[color=#ffd700][b]RELEASE LOG[/b][/color]
0.1:
- Public release

[color=#ffd700][b]CREDITS[/b][/color]
All credits to J3X for creating this mod.
Drop me a message at jex_ mus [at] hotmail [dot] com if you want anything.
Or contact me at SkyrimNexus as J3X.

[color=#ffd700][b]PERMISSION[/b][/color]
Clone, copy, spread, mutate, merge, and do whatever you want just as long you give me credit for my work.
If you upload this mod to any other site (don't upload to sites that make money from mods) please make sure that it's updated and link back to this site.
You do not need to ask for permission to use any parts of this mod.
If you create a modification to this mod please release it.
If you manage to fix some bug or add a new awesome feature please let it be included in this mod as well.


[b]I am no longer modding Skyrim but still provides tech support over email or PM.[/b]
[img]http://www.catalope.co/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/test2_.png[/img]
I run a small game studio called Catalope Games, if you enjoy my mods please check it out.
[b][url=http://www.catalope.co/]Official Webpage[/url] | [url=https://www.facebook.com/CatalopeGames/]Facebook[/url] | [url=https://twitter.com/CatalopeGames]Twitter[/url] | [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/Catalope]Join our Steam Group![/url][/b]
author: J3X
